SEARCH
Package org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.cades

Interface Signer

All Known Subinterfaces:
PKCS1Signer, PKCS7Signer
All Known Implementing Classes:
CAdESSigner, PKCS1SignerImpl
public interface Signer
Basic specification for implementation of digital signatures in CADES format.

      Set a Signature Algorithm. Ex: SHA256withRSA
      Parameters:
      algorithm - algorithm to be used

    • setAlgorithm

      void setAlgorithm(SignerAlgorithmEnum algorithm)
      Set an algorithm pre-defined in enumeration. Compatible with ICP-Brasil
      Parameters:
      algorithm - algorithm representation to be used

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      hash - hash to be signed
      Returns:
      only signed attributes for detached PCKS7 signature
